name: PyArchboot
author: grm34
title: Python Arch Linux Installer v0.0.1 - Script made with love by @grm34
description1: Arch Linux is a light and fast distribution, whose concept is to
description2: remain as simple as possible... In the same purpose and in order
description3: to give free choice to the users, this script performs a minimal
description4: arch installation, and only required packages will be installed.
description5: According to desired configuration, and in order to get complete
description6: support, additional packages may be required. Apache License 2.0
